page.title: 06A FAMILY SATURDAY
page.content: At 7.00 Dad gets up and washes and dresses and gets the breakfast. At 7.45 he leaves the house for work. Mummy gets our breakfast and we have cornflakes or sugar puffs. 8.30 Mummy washes and changes baby and at 9.00 she feeds baby. My brothers and I watch T.V. after we have got dressed. At 10.30 Auntie Mary comes and picks us up and we go to Granpy's till Daddy comes home from work. At 13.00 we have our dinner and afterwards go to Nanny Jackson where we often play in the garden. At 16.30 we go home, have some tea, usually sandwiches and biscuits and watch the television. At 18.00 we have a bath and put on our pyjamas. Mummy and Daddy and the children watch television together and then we go to bed. Mummy and Daddy stay down and watch T.V. until 22.00 and the baby is fed and put to bed about 21.00.
